# Grammar of Graphics for base plot

`amp()` for **a**esthetic **m**a**p**ping, that equivalents to `ggplot2::aes()`.


```{r}
library(bbplot)

p <- bbplot(mtcars, amp(mpg, disp, col=factor(cyl)))
p1 = p %>% ly_point
p2 = p %>% ly_lm(col='blue')
p3 = p %>% ly_point %>% ly_lm(amp(group=cyl))
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
p; p1; p2; p3
```
